name: PlaneWalker
description:
Currently the game only contains 10 levels (5 of those being tutorial levels)

I'm a huge fan of speed-running games and games in general that involve technical movement. So i intend on implementing an in-game timer soon and would love to hear about any speed-run attempts and feedback.

I do not plan on this becoming a full-time project that gets regular updates however I do plan on seeing it through further than it currently is and if there's enough demand I'll go even further than that.

Thanks so much for your interest, have fun!
